name: Viral Rampage
description:
You, a virus, have entered a human host and it is your job to take them down. Avoid bullets from the defending T-Cells and devour your way through Red-Blood cells as you infect the lungs and the heart of your victim! Be aware, the lungs have powerful gusts of air that can throw you into danger while every heartbeat shakes your vision!

Made by M.L.L.L Studio

Produced by Robert Lopez-Perez

Programmed by Daniel Lopez-Correa

Levels Designed by Johnathan Martinez

Art and Animation by Demora LeChette

Sound Design by Demora LeChette

Other Sounds from Freesound.org
